arts.ttl: Amoura secures victory for Wolfsburg away to struggling Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Wolfsburg picked up an important 1-0 away victory against lowly Hoffenheim, Mohamed Amoura scoring the decisive goal to boost the Wolves' European ambitions and extend TSG's winless Bundesliga run to five matches. Wolfsburg's Mohamed Amoura celebrates his crucial goal.

arts.ttl: Torino Linked with Bologna Defender Stefan Posch Amid Interest from Wolfsburg
arts.sum: s the winter transfer window progresses, Torino are reportedly interested in acquiring Stefan Posch, the Austrian defender currently playing for Bologna. Gianluca Di Marzio reports that The 27-year-old has emerged as a target for the Serie A club as they look to strengthen their defensive lineup. The post Torino Linked with Bologna Defender Stefan Posch Amid Interest from Wolfsburg appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Weekend acca predictions: Five teams to back across Europe
arts.sum: It is set to be another busy week across the continent with action resuming in the Bundesliga and La Liga after the winter hiatus and Liam Flin has scanned the leagues to assemble a five-team acca for Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: Report: Hoffenheim locate loan locale for transfer flop
arts.sum: Belgian transfer journalist Sacha Tavolieri reports that TSG 1899 Hoffenheim have found another locale to park Hungarian flop Attila Szalai.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs. Wolfsburg preview: Ilzer searching for second win
arts.sum: Christian Ilzer will be looking to claim his second win as Hoffenheim boss when his side welcome Wolfsburg to the PreZero Arena for Saturday’s Bundesliga contest.

arts.ttl: Leipzig signs wing back Ridle Baku from Bundesliga rival Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Leipzig has signed wing back Ridle Baku from Bundesliga rival Wolfsburg after an injury to Benjamin Henrichs. Leipzig said Friday that the 26-year-old Baku had signed a 2½-year contract to 2027.

arts.ttl: Official | Ridle Baku joins RB Leipzig from Wolfsburg for €4.5m
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have announced that they have completed their first signing of the winter window as Ridle Baku joins from Wolfsburg. Baku’s contract in the Autostadt expired at the end…

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Wolfsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Wolfsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Ridle Baku joins RB Leipzig from Wolfsburg
arts.sum: "Leipzig is a big club with huge potential and ambitious goals, regularly playing in the Champions League and playing high-tempo football that really suits my style of play and pace," Baku said on penning his two-and-a-half year deal with Die Roten Bullen . Ridle Baku has signed for RB Leipzig from Wolfsburg, putting pen to paper on a deal that will keep him at the Red Bull Arena until summer 2027.

arts.ttl: Out-of-favor Freiburg defender reportedly set for Wolfsburg move
arts.sum: VfL Wolfsburg are understood to be close to signing SC Freiburg defender Kiliann Sildillia.
